Description: Manage Groups assigned to an Application
Schema: {"typeName":"Okta::Group::GroupApplicationAssociation","description":"Manage Groups assigned to an Application","sourceUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-okta-resource-providers.git","documentationUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-okta-resource-providers","typeConfiguration":{"properties":{"OktaAccess":{"$ref":"#/definitions/OktaAccess"}},"additionalProperties":false},"definitions":{"OktaAccess":{"type":"object","properties":{"Url":{"type":"string","description":"Okta URL, including organization identifier"},"ApiKey":{"type":"string","description":"Okta API tokens are used to authenticate requests to Okta APIs."}},"additionalProperties":false}},"properties":{"ApplicationId":{"type":"string","description":"id of an app"},"GroupId":{"type":"string","description":"unique key of a valid Group"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["ApplicationId","GroupId"],"createOnlyProperties":["/properties/ApplicationId","/properties/GroupId"],"primaryIdentifier":["/properties/ApplicationId","/properties/GroupId"],"handlers":{"create":{"permissions":[]},"read":{"permissions":[]},"delete":{"permissions":[]}}}
